content: My name is Yi, and I am a language model based on the transformers architecture developed by 01.AI. How may I assist you today?
name: Evaluator

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with a potential customer who was interested in purchasing a product from my company.
name: Evaluator

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator
